content.description: The position of a particle at any time t ≥0 is given by x(t)=t2−3 and y(t)=2/3 t3
content.question: Find the total distance traveled by the particle from t=0 to t=5 .

frqParts.text: Find the total distance traveled by the particle from t=0 to t=5 .

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions
